mapper.insert: insert into tbl_movie(movie_name, description, visible_date, start_date, end_date, movie_type, movie_country, movie_language, poster_url, length, movie_year, movie_status) values (#{movieName}, #{description}, #{visibleDate}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{movieType}, #{country}, #{language}, #{posterUrl}, #{length}, #{movieYear}, 1)
mapper.update: update tbl_movie set movie_name=#{movieName}, description=#{description}, visible_date=#{visibleDate}, start_date=#{startDate}, end_date=#{endDate}, movie_type=#{movieType}, movie_country=#{country}, movie_year = #{movieYear}, movie_language=#{language}, poster_url=#{posterUrl}, length=#{length} where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into cast_movie (movie_id, cast_id, cast_role) values (#{movieId}, #{castId}, #{role})
mapper.select: select id id, cast_name castName, poster_url url from tbl_cast where cast_name = #{castName} LIMIT 1
select * from tbl_movie where movie_status = 1 or movie_status = 2

select m.id, m.movie_name, m.description, m.start_date, m.end_date, m.visible_date, m.movie_type, m.movie_country, m.movie_language, m.poster_url, m.length, m.movie_year, m.movie_status, director.director_url, director.director_name, actor.starring_name, actor.starring_url from (select * from tbl_movie where id=#{id}) as m, (select tbl_cast.cast_name as director_name,tbl_cast.poster_url as director_url from tbl_cast where tbl_cast.id in (select cm.cast_id from cast_movie cm where cm.movie_id = #{id} and cm.cast_role = 'Director' ))as director, (select tbl_cast.cast_name as starring_name,tbl_cast.poster_url as starring_url from tbl_cast where tbl_cast.id in (select cm.cast_id from cast_movie cm where cm.movie_id = #{id} and cm.cast_role = 'Actor' ))as actor
select user_id userId, `time` commentTime, comment comment from tbl_movie_comment where movie_id = #{movieId}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_movie_comment (movie_id, user_id, score, comment, `time`) values (#{movieId}, #{userId}, #{score}, #{comment}, #{time})
